original: @214a * // rje btsun rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i sgrub thabs bzhugs so//
analyzed: @214a * // rje btsun rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i sgrub thabs bzhugs so//
translated: The Means of Attaining the Venerable Vajrayoginī

original: # // rdo rje rnal 'byor ma la phyag 'tshal lo //🔽bla ma rje btsun mnga' bdag ri khrod pa'i //
analyzed: # // rdo rje rnal 'byor ma la phyag 'tshal lo // bla ma rje btsun mnga' bdag ri khrod pa'i //
translated: Homage to Vajrayoginī.

original: zhabs kyi rdul la bdag ni phyag 'tshal lo //🔽rdo rje rnal 'byor ma yi mchod pa yi //
analyzed: zhabs kyi rdul la bdag ni phyag 'tshal lo // rdo rje rnal 'byor ma yi mchod pa yi //
translated: I pay homage at the feet of the dust🔽of the lord guru Jetsun Ritropa.🔽I have written this method of worship

original: thabs ni bla ma'i gsung bzhin dran nas bris //
analyzed: thabs ni bla ma'i gsung bzhin dran nas bris //
translated: of Vajrayoginī, remembering the guru's words.

original: rnal 'byor ba yis dang por ni //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ba yis dang por ni //
translated: First, the yogī should make a maṇḍala

original: gru bzhi la sogs dkyil 'khor bya //
analyzed: gru bzhi la sogs dkyil 'khor bya //
translated: with four sides, and so forth.

original: me tog lha yi grangs bzhin dgod //
analyzed: me tog lha yi grangs bzhin dgod //
translated: Arrange flowers according to the number of deities.

original: mchod sogs gtor ma ji bzhin byas //🔽bdag nyid 'dod pa'i lha yi ni //
analyzed: mchod sogs gtor ma ji bzhin byas // bdag nyid 'dod pa'i lha yi ni //
translated: Make offerings and so forth as before.🔽One should abide in the pride

original: skad cig nga rgyal gnas pa la //
analyzed: skad cig nga rgyal gnas pa la //
translated: of one's own desired deity for an instant.

original: lag pa g-yon pas reg byas pas //
analyzed: lag pa g-yon pas reg byas pas //
translated: By touching with the left hand,

original: dpa' bo drug gi go cha dang// @214b dpa' mo'i cho ga de bzhin bya //
analyzed: dpa' bo drug gi go cha dang// @214b dpa' mo'i cho ga de bzhin bya //
translated: one should do the armor of the six heroes and the heroines' ritual.

original: aom ha ni snying gar ro //
analyzed: aom ha ni snying gar ro //
translated: Om haṃ is at the heart.

original: na ma hi ni mgo bo la'o //
analyzed: na ma hi ni mgo bo la'o //
translated: Namaḥ hiṃ is on the head.

original: sv'a h'a hu ni spyi gtsug tu'o //
analyzed: sv'a h'a hu ni spyi gtsug tu'o //
translated: Svāhā huṃ is on the crown.

original: booshat he ni phrag pa gnyis la'o //
analyzed: booshat he ni phrag pa gnyis la'o //
translated: BHOŚṬHA HE is on both shoulders.

original: h'um h'um ho ni mig dag la'o //
analyzed: h'um h'um ho ni mig dag la'o //
translated: HUM HUM HO is on both eyes.

original: mtshon char phat phat ham ni yan lag thams cad la'o //
analyzed: mtshon char phat phat ham ni yan lag thams cad la'o //
translated: For the weapons, PHAṬ PHAṬ HAṂ is on all limbs.

original: aom bam ni lte bar ro //
analyzed: aom bam ni lte bar ro //
translated: OṂ BAṂ is at the navel.

original: ham yom ni snying gar ro //🔽hrim mom ni kha la'o //🔽hrem hrim ni mgo la'o //
analyzed: ham yom ni snying gar ro // hrim mom ni kha la'o // hrem hrim ni mgo la'o //
translated: HAṂ YOṂ is at the heart.🔽 HRĪḤ MOṂ is at the mouth.🔽 HREḤ HREḤ is on the head.

original: h'um h'um ni spyi gtsug tu'o //
analyzed: h'um h'um ni spyi gtsug tu'o //
translated: HUM HUM is at the crown of the head.

original: mtshon char phat phat ni yan lag thams cad la'o //
analyzed: mtshon char phat phat ni yan lag thams cad la'o //
translated: For the weapons, PHAṬ PHAṬ is on all limbs.

original: de ltar go chag gnyis bgos nas //
analyzed: de ltar go chag gnyis bgos nas //
translated: Having thus donned the two armors,

original: dang po sbyar bar bya ba ni //
analyzed: dang po sbyar bar bya ba ni //
translated: first one should perform the consecration.

original: yam las rlung dang ram las me //
analyzed: yam las rlung dang ram las me //
translated: From YAṂ comes wind and from RAṂ comes fire.🔽 On that, from A, are three heads,

original: de steng aa las mgo gsum dang // de yi steng du ka p'a la //
analyzed: de steng aa las mgo gsum dang // de yi steng du ka p'a la //
translated: and on that, a skull cup.

original: bh'um a'am dzr'im kham h'um /
analyzed: bh'um a'am dzr'im kham h'um /
translated: BHOŪM AṂ JṚṂ KHĀM HŪṂ.

original: de dag yongs su gyur pa las //
analyzed: de dag yongs su gyur pa las //
translated: From their complete transformation,

original: bshad la sogs pa bdung rtsi lnga //
analyzed: bshad la sogs pa bdung rtsi lnga //
translated: the five ambrosias, such as feces, and so on,

original: de steng yi ge lnga nyid las //
analyzed: de steng yi ge lnga nyid las //
translated: above that, from the five syllables themselves,

original: go ku la sogs rnam lngar 'gyur //🔽aom gyi yi ges sbyang bar bya //
analyzed: go ku la sogs rnam lngar 'gyur // aom gyi yi ges sbyang bar bya //
translated: the five, such as cow, and so on, arise.🔽With the syllable OṂ, one should purify.

original: a'a: yi yi ges rtogs par bya //
analyzed: a'a: yi yi ges rtogs par bya //
translated: With the syllable AḤ, one should realize.🔽 With the syllable HŪṂ, one should consecrate.

original: h'um gi yi ges rab tu 'bar //
analyzed: h'um gi yi ges rab tu 'bar //
translated: The syllable hūṃ blazes intensely.

original: ho yi yi ges bdud rtsir 'gyur //🔽g-yon pa'i lag pas sbyang bar bya //
analyzed: ho yi yi ges bdud rtsir 'gyur // g-yon pa'i lag pas sbyang bar bya //
translated: The syllable hoṃ becomes nectar.🔽One should purify with the left hand,

original: g-yas pa'i lag pas rtogs par bya //
analyzed: g-yas pa'i lag pas rtogs par bya //
translated: and realize with the right hand.

original: thal mo bkab pas 'bar bar byed //
analyzed: thal mo bkab pas 'bar bar byed //
translated: The blazing is done by covering with the palms.

original: bya khyad phyag rgyas bdud rtsir bsgyur //
analyzed: bya khyad phyag rgyas bdud rtsir bsgyur //
translated: The transformation into nectar is done with the mudra of the bird.

original: zla ba zhu ba'i rang bzhin te //
analyzed: zla ba zhu ba'i rang bzhin te //
translated: The nature of the melting moon

original: de nas g-yon pa'i ming med kyi //
analyzed: de nas g-yon pa'i ming med kyi //
translated: is then taken up with the left ring finger

original: rang gi thigs pa blangs nas su //
analyzed: rang gi thigs pa blangs nas su //
translated: and one’s own drop.

original: sa la chos 'byung gru gsum bya //
analyzed: sa la chos 'byung gru gsum bya //
translated: On the ground, one should make a triangular dharmodaya.

original: de yi dbus su zlum po ni //
analyzed: de yi dbus su zlum po ni //
translated: In the middle of that, one should make

original: thig le yi ni gzugs su bya //
analyzed: thig le yi ni gzugs su bya //
translated: a round drop-like form.

original: dkyil 'khor 'khor lo bsam par bya //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor 'khor lo bsam par bya //
translated: One should imagine the maṇḍala cakra.

original: de nas thig le mchod par bya //
analyzed: de nas thig le mchod par bya //
translated: Then one should worship the drop.

original: rang gi mgrin par myang bar bya //
analyzed: rang gi mgrin par myang bar bya //
translated: One should taste it at one’s throat.

original: aom a'a: h'um /
analyzed: aom a'a: h'um /
translated: Oṃ āḥ hūṃ.🔽

original: thabs dang shes rab tshim par byed pa'i cho ga ste thun mong ba'o //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab tshim par byed pa'i cho ga ste thun mong ba'o //
translated: This is the common rite of satisfying method and wisdom.

original: g-yon pa'i lag pa'i mthil la ni //
analyzed: g-yon pa'i lag pa'i mthil la ni //
translated: In the center of the palm of the left hand,

original: padma dmar po 'dab lnga bsgom //
analyzed: padma dmar po 'dab lnga bsgom //
translated: one should visualize a red five-petal lotus.

original: dbus su aom bam rdo rje phag //
analyzed: dbus su aom bam rdo rje phag //
translated: In the center, oṃ vaṃ is Vajravārāhī.

original: gshin rje yum mtshams 'dab ma la //
analyzed: gshin rje yum mtshams 'dab ma la //
translated: On the petal of Yama's consort

original: ham yo dag ni ya mi ni //🔽hrim mom dag ni rmongs byed ma //
analyzed: ham yo dag ni ya mi ni // hrim mom dag ni rmongs byed ma //
translated: are HAM and YOM, Yamini.🔽HRIM and MOM are Mohini.

original: hrem hrim dag ni skyed byed ma //
analyzed: hrem hrim dag ni skyed byed ma //
translated: HRIM and HRIM are Uddiani.

original: phat phat dag ni tsanti ka'o //
analyzed: phat phat dag ni tsanti ka'o //
translated: PHAT and PHAT are Chandika.

original: rgan po la ni rdo rje sems //
analyzed: rgan po la ni rdo rje sems //
translated: On the old man is Vajrasattva.

original: mdzub mo la ni rnam snang mdzad //
analyzed: mdzub mo la ni rnam snang mdzad //
translated: On the index finger is Vairocana.

original: padma gar dbang gung mo la //🔽he ru ka dpal mid med la'o //🔽rdo rje nyi ma mthe'u chung la'o //
analyzed: padma gar dbang gung mo la // he ru ka dpal mid med la'o // rdo rje nyi ma mthe'u chung la'o //
translated: On the middle finger is Padma-Heruka.🔽On the ring finger is glorious Hayagriva.🔽On the little finger is Vajrasun.

original: rta mchog rdo rje sen phreng la'o //
analyzed: rta mchog rdo rje sen phreng la'o //
translated: On the nails is Hayagriva.

original: de ltar yid kyi bsgom pa ni //
analyzed: de ltar yid kyi bsgom pa ni //
translated: Thus, the mental meditation

original: sngags kyi yi ge'i gzugs nyid dam //
analyzed: sngags kyi yi ge'i gzugs nyid dam //
translated: is the form of the mantra syllables,

original: yang na kha dog dbyibs kyi gzugs //
analyzed: yang na kha dog dbyibs kyi gzugs //
translated: or the form of color and shape.

original: rang gi ming brjod me tog bcas //
analyzed: rang gi ming brjod me tog bcas //
translated: Reciting their names, with flowers

original: de dag gis ni dgod par bya //
analyzed: de dag gis ni dgod par bya //
translated: one should cause them to laugh.

original: de la me tog spos @215a * //
analyzed: de la me tog spos @215a * //
translated: There, one should worship with flowers and incense,

original: kyis mchod // chang gis kyang ni tshim par bya //
analyzed: kyis mchod // chang gis kyang ni tshim par bya //
translated: and also satisfy them with beer.

original: de nas mandala steng du blugs //
analyzed: de nas mandala steng du blugs //
translated: Then, one should place them on the mandala,🔽and again place them on one's head.

original: slar yang rang gi mgo la gzhag / phyi nang 'khor lo sdom pa mchod //
analyzed: slar yang rang gi mgo la gzhag / phyi nang 'khor lo sdom pa mchod //
translated: One should worship externally and internally the Cakrasaṃvara.

original: dkyil 'khor 'khor lo rdzogs pa'am //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor 'khor lo rdzogs pa'am //
translated: The mandala wheel is complete,

original: yang na bcu gsum bdag nyid sogs //
analyzed: yang na bcu gsum bdag nyid sogs //
translated: or else it has thirteen parts, and so forth.

original: rang gi snying ga'i sa bon las dam tshig 'khor lo spro bar bya //
analyzed: rang gi snying ga'i sa bon las dam tshig 'khor lo spro bar bya //
translated: From the seed syllable in one’s heart center, one should emanate the pledge wheel,🔽and then introduce the wisdom wheel.

original: ye shes 'khor lo de nas gzhug / me tog la sogs re re yang //
analyzed: ye shes 'khor lo de nas gzhug / me tog la sogs re re yang //
translated: Each of the flowers and so forth🔽is offered to Vajravārāhī

original: snying po sngags sam nye snying gis //🔽rdo rje phag mo mchod par bya //
analyzed: snying po sngags sam nye snying gis // rdo rje phag mo mchod par bya //
translated: with the essence mantra or the quintessence.

original: mkha' 'gro la sogs lha mo rnams //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro la sogs lha mo rnams //
translated: The goddesses such as the dakini🔽are offered with their individual names

original: rang gi ming brjod sngags la ni //🔽aom ni thog mar h'um h'um mthar //
analyzed: rang gi ming brjod sngags la ni // aom ni thog mar h'um h'um mthar //
translated: at the beginning and end of the mantra.

original: sbyar ba yis na ni mchod par bya //🔽phyogs rnams dag ni g-yon skor te //
analyzed: sbyar ba yis na ni mchod par bya // phyogs rnams dag ni g-yon skor te //
translated: One should offer with the addition of oṃ at the beginning and hūṃ hūṃ at the end.🔽The directions are circumambulated counterclockwise,

original: mtshams rnams dag ni g-yas skor du'o //
analyzed: mtshams rnams dag ni g-yas skor du'o //
translated: and the intermediate directions are circumambulated clockwise.

original: rkang pa brgyad pa'i bstod pas mchod //
analyzed: rkang pa brgyad pa'i bstod pas mchod //
translated: One should offer with the praise in eight verses.

original: de ltar mchod pa rdzogs pa dang // snod gzhan dag ni byin brlabs la //
analyzed: de ltar mchod pa rdzogs pa dang // snod gzhan dag ni byin brlabs la //
translated: Having thus completed the offerings, one should consecrate another vessel,

original: snod gnyis gcig tu bsre bar bya //
analyzed: snod gnyis gcig tu bsre bar bya //
translated: and mix the two vessels together.

original: ts'a ru'i bza' ba de la bshad /
analyzed: ts'a ru'i bza' ba de la bshad /
translated: That is explained as the food of caru.

original: de nas gtor ma byin brlabs la //
analyzed: de nas gtor ma byin brlabs la //
translated: Then, having consecrated the bali,

original: dang po sngags kyis snyan gsan dbab //
analyzed: dang po sngags kyis snyan gsan dbab //
translated: First, one should invite with the mantra.

original: kha kha la sogs sngags kyis ni //
analyzed: kha kha la sogs sngags kyis ni //
translated: With the mantra of Kha Kha and so forth,

original: gtor ma rjes su dbul bar bya //🔽de nas rnal 'byor tshul ji bzhin //
analyzed: gtor ma rjes su dbul bar bya // de nas rnal 'byor tshul ji bzhin //
translated: one should offer the torma.🔽Then, one should abide in the enjoyments of desire

original: 'dod pa'i longs spyod rnams la gnas //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i longs spyod rnams la gnas //
translated: just as one pleases, in accordance with the method of yoga.

original: glu dang gar sogs thams cad bya //🔽badzra mandala mu: zhes pa'i ;
analyzed: glu dang gar sogs thams cad bya // badzra mandala mu: zhes pa'i ;
translated: One should do all the songs, dances, and so forth.🔽With the mantra of Vajra Mandala MU,

original: / sngags kyi mthar ni gshegs su gsol //
analyzed: / sngags kyi mthar ni gshegs su gsol //
translated: one should request the departure.

original: lhag ma rnams ni sngon bzhin du //🔽gtor ma byin gyis brlab par bya //
analyzed: lhag ma rnams ni sngon bzhin du // gtor ma byin gyis brlab par bya //
translated: The remainder is consecrated as before.

original: zos shing 'thungs pa'i lhag ma rnams //
analyzed: zos shing 'thungs pa'i lhag ma rnams //
translated: The remainder of what is eaten and drunk

original: sor mo lnga las bdud rtsi'i rgyun //🔽bab par bsams nas yi dags kyi //
analyzed: sor mo lnga las bdud rtsi'i rgyun // bab par bsams nas yi dags kyi //
translated: is the stream of elixir that falls from the five fingers.

original: tshogs dag la ni sbyin par bya //
analyzed: tshogs dag la ni sbyin par bya //
translated: Thinking that, one should give it to the assembly of ghosts.

original: de dag ni tshogs kyi 'khor lo dang thun mong pa'i cho ga'o //
analyzed: de dag ni tshogs kyi 'khor lo dang thun mong pa'i cho ga'o //
translated: Those are the rituals common to the gaṇacakra.

original: tshes bcu la sogs dus dag tu //
analyzed: tshes bcu la sogs dus dag tu //
translated: On the tenth day of the month, and so forth,

original: gzhan yang bla ma'i gdams dus su //
analyzed: gzhan yang bla ma'i gdams dus su //
translated: and also at the time of the guru’s command,

original: gong bzhi mandala byas pa la //
analyzed: gong bzhi mandala byas pa la //
translated: one should make the maṇḍala as before.

original: rnal 'byor ma yi mtshan ma ni //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma yi mtshan ma ni //
translated: The sign of the yoginīs

original: g-yung drung 'khyil pa bri bar bya //
analyzed: g-yung drung 'khyil pa bri bar bya //
translated: One should draw a swastika.

original: mtshams kyi char ni thig le bya //
analyzed: mtshams kyi char ni thig le bya //
translated: In the intermediate directions, one should make bindus.

original: de yi dbus su mchod bya ba //
analyzed: de yi dbus su mchod bya ba //
translated: In the middle of that, one should make offerings.

original: slar yang de bzhin dri med phyir //
analyzed: slar yang de bzhin dri med phyir //
translated: Again, in the same way, for the sake of purity,

original: snod du mdzes ma legs par btsags //
analyzed: snod du mdzes ma legs par btsags //
translated: one should grind the beautiful substances in a vessel.

original: chos 'byung kha sbyor 'khor lo dbus //
analyzed: chos 'byung kha sbyor 'khor lo dbus //
translated: In the middle of the wheel of the joined source of phenomena,

original: gsang sngags ma smang ba zhes 'di //
analyzed: gsang sngags ma smang ba zhes 'di //
translated: this is called the “unwritten mantra.”

original: cho ga bzhin du dben par bri //🔽'khor lo'i mtshams su phag mo sogs //
analyzed: cho ga bzhin du dben par bri // 'khor lo'i mtshams su phag mo sogs //
translated: One should draw it in a secluded place, according to the rite.

original: go cha'i lha mo mtshan ma drug / g-yung drung 'khyil pa'i mtshan @215b ma bri //
analyzed: go cha'i lha mo mtshan ma drug / g-yung drung 'khyil pa'i mtshan @215b ma bri //
translated: At the intermediate directions of the wheel, one should draw the six signs of the armor goddesses, such as Vārāhī,

original: me tog dri zhim phreng bas bskor //
analyzed: me tog dri zhim phreng bas bskor //
translated: surrounded by fragrant flower garlands.🔽With the four fruits, the four loads, and the special offerings of fragrant flowers,

original: 'bras bu bzhi dang khur sna bzhi dang dang // khyad par can gyi mchod pa dri zhim me tog dang // mchod pa rnam pa du mas 'khor lo legs par mchod //
analyzed: 'bras bu bzhi dang khur sna bzhi dang dang // khyad par can gyi mchod pa dri zhim me tog dang // mchod pa rnam pa du mas 'khor lo legs par mchod //
translated: one should make offerings to the wheel with many kinds of offerings.

original: grong khyer 'jig par gyur pa 'di ni mchog yin no //
analyzed: grong khyer 'jig par gyur pa 'di ni mchog yin no //
translated: This is the supreme destruction of the city.

original: 'dir ni lha mo'i snying po dang / nye ba'i snying po'i sngags ni rgyun mi 'chad par bzlas la brtson pa na /
analyzed: 'dir ni lha mo'i snying po dang / nye ba'i snying po'i sngags ni rgyun mi 'chad par bzlas la brtson pa na /
translated: Here, one should recite the essence mantra of the goddess and the quintessence mantra, striving without interruption.

original: 'gro ba'i don byed pa la dka' ba yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'gro ba'i don byed pa la dka' ba yod pa ma yin te /
translated: There is no difficulty in acting for the benefit of the world.

original: chos don 'dod pa thams cad 'grub 'gyur te /
analyzed: chos don 'dod pa thams cad 'grub 'gyur te /
translated: All desired aims of the Dharma will be accomplished.

original: de dag ni thun mong ma yin pa'i cho ga'o //
analyzed: de dag ni thun mong ma yin pa'i cho ga'o //
translated: These are the uncommon rites.

original: rnal 'byor ba yis rtag tu ni //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ba yis rtag tu ni //
translated: The yogin should always🔽make offerings to the mandala

original: gal te yi dam du byed na //
analyzed: gal te yi dam du byed na //
translated: if he is to take the deity as his commitment.

original: des na snga dro'i dus dag tu //
analyzed: des na snga dro'i dus dag tu //
translated: Then, at the time of dawn,

original: cho ga bzhin du dkyil 'khor bya //🔽rang 'dod lta yi grangs bzhin du //
analyzed: cho ga bzhin du dkyil 'khor bya // rang 'dod lta yi grangs bzhin du //
translated: one should make a mandala according to the rite.🔽One should scatter flowers

original: me tog dag ni dgram par bya //
analyzed: me tog dag ni dgram par bya //
translated: in accordance with the number of deities.

original: rang gi snying ga'i sa bon las //
analyzed: rang gi snying ga'i sa bon las //
translated: One should visualize the pledge being from one’s heart

original: spros pa'i dam tshig sems dpa' gzhag / ye shes sems dpa' de la gzhug / de nas me tog la sogs pa //🔽snying po sngags dang nye snying po //
analyzed: spros pa'i dam tshig sems dpa' gzhag / ye shes sems dpa' de la gzhug / de nas me tog la sogs pa // snying po sngags dang nye snying po //
translated: and the awareness being entering it,🔽and then make offerings with the essence mantra, the quintessence mantra,

original: rkang pa brgyad pa'i sngags kyis mchod //
analyzed: rkang pa brgyad pa'i sngags kyis mchod //
translated: and the eight-line mantra.

original: mkha' 'gro ma sogs thams cad ni //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma sogs thams cad ni //
translated: One should make offerings to all the dakinis and so forth🔽with the essence mantra, the quintessence mantra,🔽and the eight-line mantra.

original: rang gi ming brjod sngags la ni //
analyzed: rang gi ming brjod sngags la ni //
translated: One should recite one's own name in the mantra.

original: thog mar aom dang h'um h'um phat //
analyzed: thog mar aom dang h'um h'um phat //
translated: At the beginning, one should add Om, and at the end, Hum Hum Phat.

original: mthar sbyar ba yi sngags kyis mchod //
analyzed: mthar sbyar ba yi sngags kyis mchod //
translated: One should worship with a mantra to which this is added.

original: de lta'i tshul du rgyas par byas //
analyzed: de lta'i tshul du rgyas par byas //
translated: One should perform in this way in an extensive manner.

original: phyag rgya che la mchog gzhol zhing //
analyzed: phyag rgya che la mchog gzhol zhing //
translated: One who is devoted to the supreme, the great seal,

original: de lta'i lam la zhugs pa dag /'og ma'i lam du mi 'gro zhes //
analyzed: de lta'i lam la zhugs pa dag /'og ma'i lam du mi 'gro zhes //
translated: and who has entered this path, will not go to a lower path.

original: bdag gi bla mas de skad gsungs //
analyzed: bdag gi bla mas de skad gsungs //
translated: My guru has said this.

original: rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i mchod pa la sogs pa mdor bsdus pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i mchod pa la sogs pa mdor bsdus pa rdzogs so /
translated: The brief VajrayoginI puja, and so forth, is complete.

original: // / rgya gar mkhan po badzra p'a na'i zhal snga nas /

translated: The Indian abbot Vajrapani and

original: lo ts'a ba mtshur gyis bsgyur ba'o//
